text:
meaningful mapping from inputs to outputs to learn. Modeling a mapping of a random walk
will perform no better than a persistence model (e.g. using the last seen observation as the
forecast). This expectation of a learnable mapping function also makes one of the limitations
clear: the mapping function is ﬁxed or static.
 Fixed Inputs. The number of lag input variables is ﬁxed, in the same way as traditional
time series forecasting methods.
